data.persona: I live next door to my best friend.  My friends depend on me to keep the location of their treasure a secret.  I am always ready to defend my friends from the sheriff's men when they come to collect unjust taxes.
data.description:
You are in the Lakeside House.
Its white and vibrant, certainly a location for some lord, It has 3 floors, and fine gardening surround the house. Its open and breezy this place is calm and peaceful.
There's a floor here.
The lord is here.

You are carrying a family heirloom, wearing a shirt, and wielding a blade.

data.short_motivation: I want to threaten the Lord
data.mid_motivation: I want the lord to reduce taxes today
data.long_motivation: I hope that my friends would have a better quality of life in the coming months
